channel.title: Demoes on Meine Seite
channel.description: Recent content in Demoes on Meine Seite

item.title: Benefits of static site generators
item.description:
Improved performance, security and ease of use are just a few of the reasons static site generators are so appealing.

The purpose of website generators is to render content into HTML files. Most are “dynamic site generators.” That means the HTTP server—i.e., the program that sends files to the browser to be viewed—runs the generator to create a new HTML file every time an end user requests a page.

item.title: Markdown Sample
item.description:
Headers

# h1 Heading 8-)
## h2 Heading
### h3 Heading
#### h4 Heading
##### h5 Heading
###### h6 Heading

Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style:

Alt-H1
======

Alt-H2
------
